channel.title: Argon OSRS - Looking for Server Developer (x1 position avaiable)
channel.description:
[center][img]http://puu.sh/d9ax8/a2035c3667.png[/img]
We are looking for developers to Argon OSRS (and oldschool based) rsps.
It's pretty promising server there's a lot cool stuff done such as the Nightmare zone, random events, and so on.
[b]Contacting us[/b] Just add my skype: NexonLTD, and tell me that you're interested.
We have already 2 server developers which is ok but still too much work to do. The server will be launched in approx. under 1 month, we have all website and forum stuff on work.
[b]How do I can join to Argon's development team?[/b] *You must be mature 16+ age required. *You don't have to be a super-dev that knows every single package on Java, if you understand booleans,ints,arrays,abstract, and such you will be accepted. *You must be active, we do not want unactive developers since this is a upcoming server. [b] Our current team[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/dd2RG/d66188b62d.png[/img]
[b]Some pics of Argon[/b]
[img]http://puu.sh/cZoRd/b0b93555e4.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d69eX/59d055c683.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d6h9f/f871465d59.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d89dE/790bae5c5e.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d9XIZ/ed0c5a74d3.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/dbHEL/141e67f482.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/dcwLV/2d03d9db9b.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/d07Pn/1dd422c90a.png[/img]

We are looking for developers to Argon OSRS (and oldschool based) rsps.

It’s pretty promising server there’s a lot cool stuff done such as the Nightmare zone, random events, and so on.
